resources.string:
PopularityQuiz Rules 


Game screen is divided into two equal pieces, a top one, and a bottom one. Each one of them contains cover image and title of an anime. Your job is to choose which anime is more popular. Based on MyAnimeList most popular anime ranking. Each good guess is counted as a point, after you face Defeat or embrace Victory you will see how many points you managed to get. 


Good Luck!!
